overview.en: ESTT is a peer-to-peer digital currency that enables you to send and receive funds at a lower cost due to its fully decentralised blockchain system. ESTT is tied through a smart contract to Tether (USDT), providing you with the flexibility to exchange between ESTT and USDT any time when you need them, as low as 1 ESTT = 1 USDT.
overview.zh: ESTT 是一种以点对点技术开发的加密货币，其去中心化区块链系统使发送和接收资金的成本得以降至最低。为提高兑换灵活性，ESTT通过智能合约与Tether(USDT)连接，让您在ESTT和USDT之间随时进行兑换的，兑换率低至1 ESTT=1 USDT。
